In the 2004 movie 'Krishna Cottage', which of the following statements are true regarding the mysterious force and its actions inside Nupur's house?
Options:
A. A) The mysterious force is responsible for Nupur's death.
B. B) The mysterious force only manifests outside the house.
C. C) Nupur was killed by unknown means within her residence.
D. D) The actions of the mysterious force are confined to her house.
Correct Answer: A) The mysterious force is responsible for Nupur's death., C) Nupur was killed by unknown means within her residence., D) The actions of the mysterious force are confined to her house.
